page.title: 02HIGHAM FERRERS SHOE INDUSTRY
page.content:
Since 1860 the footwear industry has provided employment for plenty of people in the local area.To see how this has changed we went to Grensons and John Whites.
During the interview we were told that safety conditions had changed,in earlier days they had belt driven machines without guards. Today new technology means that machines have guards and are a lot safer. People used to lose fingers or arms but dangerous machinery has now been banned.
Whites produces shoes mainly for the domestic market but Grensons sell a lot of shoes to Japan, U.S.A., Italy, France, Holland and Belgium.
